name: nodejs from devcontainer-essentials
description: Install Node.js JavaScript runtime with npm, optional Yarn and pnpm package managers. Supports versions 10, 12, 14, 16, 18, 20, LTS, and latest. Perfect for web development, APIs, and full-stack applications.

installYarn.description: Install Yarn package manager - fast, reliable, and secure dependency management

nodePackageManager.description: Set default package manager: 'npm' (built-in), 'yarn' (if installed), or 'pnpm' (if installed)
